recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl
Add ghee and milk to form soft dough
Shape into smooth balls without cracks
Fry balls on medium heat until golden brown
Soak in warm syrup for 2 hours
Serve warm or at room temperature

recipes.name: Kaju Katli
instructions: Make sugar syrup of one-string consistency
Add cashew powder to syrup and mix well
Cook until mixture forms a dough
Knead on greased surface until smooth
Roll out and cut into diamond shapes

recipes.name: Besan Ladoo
instructions: Add besan and roast on low heat
Stir continuously until golden and aromatic
Mix well and shape into round balls

recipes.name: Vegetable Samosa
instructions: Prepare dough with flour, oil and salt
Roll dough and cut into circles
Shape into cones and add filling

recipes.name: Murukku
instructions: Add butter and rub into flour
Add water gradually to make dough
Use murukku maker with star shape
Fry on medium heat until crisp

recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Layer rice and vegetables in pot
Add saffron milk and fried onions
Seal with dough or tight lid

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Add tomato puree and cook well
Add spices and cook until oil separates
Serve hot with naan or rice

recipes.name: Puri Bhaji
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes for bhaji
Add onions and cook until soft
Deep fry until puffed and golden

recipes.name: Rice Kheer
instructions: Wash and soak rice for 15 minutes
Add rice and cook on low heat
Cook until rice is soft and creamy
Garnish with fried nuts and raisins

recipes.name: Chole Bhature
instructions: Prepare dough with flour and yogurt
Deep fry until puffed and golden
Serve hot with chole and onions

recipes.name: Biryani
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
Partially cook rice with whole spices
Layer meat and rice in heavy pot
Add saffron milk and fried onions
Seal with dough or tight lid

recipes.name: Sheer Khurma
instructions: Add fried vermicelli to boiling milk
Cook on low heat until thickened

recipes.name: Seviyan
instructions: Add milk and bring to boil

recipes.name: Kebabs
instructions: Shallow fry or grill until cooked

recipes.name: Haleem
instructions: Cook on low heat for hours
Serve hot with lemon and onions

recipes.name: Nihari
instructions: Sear meat in ghee until brown
Add water and bring to boil
Simmer on low heat for hours
Cook until meat is falling off bone
Serve with naan or rumali roti

recipes.name: Shahi Tukda
instructions: Fry bread in ghee until golden
Add khoya and cardamom to milk
Soak fried bread in milk mixture

recipes.name: Korma
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
Add whole spices and onion paste

recipes.name: Phirni
instructions: Add rice paste to boiling milk
Pour into earthen pots if available

recipes.name: Kunafa
instructions: Press half dough in baking pan

recipes.name: Roast Turkey
instructions: Pat turkey dry with paper towels
Season cavity with salt and pepper
Stuff with onions, celery, and herbs
Rub butter under and over skin
Place in roasting pan breast-side up
Roast for 3-4 hours until internal temperature reaches 75°C

recipes.name: Christmas Fruitcake
instructions: Soak dried fruits in alcohol overnight
Cream butter and sugar until light
Beat in eggs one at a time
Line cake tin with parchment paper
Bake for 2.5-3 hours until skewer comes clean

recipes.name: Gingerbread Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugar until fluffy
Add molasses and egg, mix well
Combine dry ingredients in separate bowl
Mix wet and dry ingredients to form dough

recipes.name: Eggnog
instructions: Whisk egg yolks with half the sugar
Heat milk in saucepan until steaming
Temper egg yolks with hot milk
Return to pan and cook until thickened
Whip egg whites with remaining sugar

recipes.name: Roast Potatoes
instructions: Peel and cut potatoes into chunks
Drain and shake in colander to fluff edges
Heat oil in roasting pan in oven
Add potatoes to hot oil carefully

recipes.name: Christmas Pudding
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl
Add eggs and enough brandy to moisten
Spoon mixture into basin, smooth top
Steam for 6-8 hours, checking water level
Serve with brandy butter or custard

recipes.name: Mulled Wine
instructions: Combine wine and spices in saucepan
Simmer for 15-20 minutes on low heat
Remove from heat and add brandy if using
Strain to remove spices if desired

recipes.name: Yule Log
instructions: Whip egg whites with cream of tartar
Beat egg yolks with sugar until pale
Fold in flour and cocoa gently
Spread batter on lined baking sheet
Roll immediately in towel while warm

recipes.name: Honey Glazed Ham
instructions: Score ham fat in diamond pattern
Stud with whole cloves at intersections
Mix honey, sugar, mustard for glaze
Add pineapple juice to pan drippings

recipes.name: Shortbread Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugar until light
Form into disc and chill 30 minutes

recipes.name: Haleem
instructions: Cook meat with bones until tender
Cook wheat and lentils separately until soft
Shred cooked meat finely, removing bones
Combine all ingredients in large pot
Cook on low heat for 4-6 hours, stirring frequently
Use wooden spoon to mash and blend mixture
Prepare tempering with ghee and fried onions
Serve hot with lemon wedges and fried onions

recipes.name: Dates with Milk
instructions: Wash dates and remove pits if needed
Add cardamom or honey if using
Let sit for 2-3 minutes to soften dates
Eat dates first as per tradition

recipes.name: Fruit Chaat
instructions: Combine all fruits in large bowl
Sprinkle chaat masala and cumin powder
Can be chilled briefly before serving

recipes.name: Kebabs
instructions: Squeeze excess water from grated onion
Mix minced meat with all ingredients
Shape into oval or round patties
Heat oil in pan or grill
Turn carefully to cook both sides

recipes.name: Rooh Afza
instructions: Soak basil seeds in water if using
Add Rooh Afza syrup to serving jug
Pour cold water or milk gradually
Stir well to dissolve syrup completely
Add soaked basil seeds if using
Can be prepared in advance and chilled

recipes.name: Samosas
instructions: Prepare dough with flour, oil and salt
Cook filling until well combined and dry
Roll dough and cut into semi-circles
Shape into cones and add filling
Deep fry until golden brown and crisp

recipes.name: Chana Chaat
instructions: Sprinkle chaat masala and cumin powder
Can add sev or papdi for crunch

recipes.name: Sheer Khurma
instructions: Boil milk in separate thick-bottomed pot
Add fried vermicelli to boiling milk
Cook on low heat until thickened
Garnish with fried nuts and serve

recipes.name: Dahi Bhalla
instructions: Whip yogurt until smooth and creamy
Soak fried vadas in warm water
Press gently to remove excess water

recipes.name: Qeema Samosa
instructions: Prepare dough with flour, oil and salt
Add minced meat and cook until brown
Add spices and peas, cook until dry
Roll dough and cut into circles
Shape into cones and add meat filling
Deep fry until golden and crispy
